about_the_game:
Your father has disappeared, and it's up to you to find him.
Follow his trail, encountering the furious legendary creatures he met before

The Legends Beyond Legends is an Adventure Point & Click featuring foreign legends and has Pop-up book pages as stages.

GAMEPLAY

•  You are a child, and with the blessings of the 3 mothers, you must follow your father's trail, confronting furious legendary creatures using your book of legends.


• Pick up and use items to solve problems
• Choose what to say and gather information about your father's whereabouts
• Receive the blessings of the 3 mothers and go where no child has gone before
• Learn about the legends and their weaknesses to get rid of them
• Confront furious legendary creatures and gain new powers
• Find the missing fisherman and become a legend!

KEY FEATURES:

• Classic Adventure Point & Click gameplay
• +20 scenarios that pop out of the pages like in a pop-up book
• 10 legends from Brazilian folklore to discover and consult in the book of legends
• Coherent, educational, and humorous narrative with a surprising ending
• 1-2 hours of gameplay suitable for the whole family
• Option of character between a boy or a girl
• Integrated task list so you don't lose track of your journey
• Original soundtrack

ACCESSIBILITY:

• Custom volume controls for sound effects and music
• Text-to-speech feature for reading texts
• Customization of on-screen text size
